function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interpretation of pedestrian presence as a sign of healthy public space may lead to high population density and increased risk of contagious disease spread.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to crowded public spaces.","Mitigation":"Implement crowd management strategies and social distancing measures in public spaces.","Technologies":"Crowd monitoring systems, contactless access control systems.","People":"People visiting or working in public spaces.","Owner":"City officials and public space managers."},{"Description":"Reliance on past data for pedestrian models may lead to inaccurate projections of public space use and potential overcrowding.","Impact":"Overcrowding and increased risk of contagious disease transmission in public spaces.","Mitigation":"Regularly update pedestrian models and data analysis with real-time data and pandemic-informed usage patterns.","Technologies":"Real-time pedestrian tracking systems, AI-powered predictive modeling.","People":"City planners, urban researchers, public health officials.","Owner":"City planning departments, research institutions."},{"Description":"Use of digital data collection devices for monitoring public space usage raises legal and ethical concerns regarding privacy and surveillance.","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy and misuse of collected data for surveillance purposes.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy regulations and security measures for data collection and storage.","Technologies":"Blockchain-based data encryption, anonymization protocols.","People":"Residents and visitors in public spaces.","Owner":"Government agencies, data collection organizations."},{"Description":"Social and class differences in the use of public space may lead to unequal exposure to contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission among lower income households due to higher public exposure.","Mitigation":"Ensure equal access to healthcare resources and provide support for remote work and access to essential services.","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, remote work technology, community support mobile apps.","People":"Lower income households, essential workers.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, employers, community organizations."}]}
